title: StarCraft Ghost Type ID
content:
Hey Typophile,

I am wondering if any one can help id the GHOST typeface used in the attached image.

Thanks a bunch!  
Dane

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819201654im_/http:/typophile.com/files/StarCraft-Ghost_Logo1_6551.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [StarCraft-Ghost\_Logo1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819201654/http:/typophile.com/files/StarCraft-Ghost_Logo1.jpg) | 72.57 KB |
author: tide21

comments.content: Looks like [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819201654/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/eurostile) Extended slightly customizd to me.

Thanks Ryuk,

After doing some more research I think that it is a little closer to Saturn-Extended Bold [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dsgnhaus/saturn/extended-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819201654/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dsgnhaus/saturn/extended-bold/)

Thanks for your help!  
Dane

Disagree on Saturn Extended even if it looks to share quite the same design backbone as Eurostile. Sample /S has a transition spine between top and bottom part almost horizontal like Eurostile, Saturn's more oblique. But Saturn could work fine too :)
Thanks for pointing that out, much appreciated!
